comments:
I wonder why EMF is not tested for some obvious cases. The following piece of
code may not make sense all the time, but EMF doesn't know what to do with it:

---------------------
package test;

/**
 * @model
 */
public interface Test1 {
	/**
	 * @model
	 */
	public void getSomething();
}
---------------------

The void accessor generates:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore 2 0 2005-02-26 13:23:59.50
!MESSAGE

The fix was commited to CVS.

Thanks for pointing out a problem that has gone undetected after several years
of use.
